title: Can you smuggle data in an ID card photo?
summary:
Can you smuggle data in an ID card photo?

The article discusses the possibility of smuggling data into an ID card photo using steganography. The author created a new ID card by adding a reclamation blog to the photo. The article explains the process of using an aplikacja mobilna, eDO App, to read data from the warstwa elektroniczna of the ID card. The author notes that the data can be read from the ID card, but the information about the reclamation blog is not visible in the photo. The article concludes that steganography is a useful technique for hiding data in images, but it has limitations in terms of the amount of data that can be hidden and the visibility of the hidden data.
